popcorn.title: Popcorn! According to Steph Curry
popcorn.description: Using D3.js library, I created a dynamic chart that visualizes 29 NBA arena rankings based on popcorn quality. The chart, as well as the axes are transformed when different options are selected from the dropdown menu.
